sense.def:
Izraz
nor
se uporablja v povezavi z besedo
neither
in uvaja drugo stvar, na katero se nanaša nikalna trditev.

seg.quote: Neither Margaret nor John was there.
My father could neither read nor write.

sense.def:
Nor
uporabljamo tudi za nikalno trditvijo, da dodamo še nekaj, za kar prav tako velja ta nikalna trditev.

seg.quote: Melanie was not to be found—not that day, nor the next day, nor the day after that.
I could not afford to eat in restaurants and nor could anyone I knew.
